Articles.Content:
I'm not too sure if I've made a post such as this before, but I'd like to introduce myself to the forums.

I have a staple space program, known as the KARD-Stock Space Exploration Agency, fully equipped with its own custom flag!

My space program has several divisions to it, which are as follows:

KARD-Stock Stock Agency

KARD-Stock KScale2

64k KARD-Stock

KARD-Stock Space Exploration and Kolonization Agency

KARD-Stock Realism Overhaul

I've been "developing" this space program for a few months at this point, and it's become my staple program to use in my installs. I'm honestly looking forwards to 1.1 simply to get a fresh start to the KS-SEA (Get it? KSC?) agency.

Anyways, I've enjoyed my time on the forums so far, and I'm sure my time here will only get better.

Hello Mysterion, and welcome!

Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!
Glad to be here, feeling very welcome.
